Class CardPhaseController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.FXMLControllers.FXMLController
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.FXMLControllers.CardPhaseController
public class CardPhaseController extends FXMLController
Controls the logic and rendering operations during a specific card-based phase of the Galaxy Trucker application. Extending the FXMLController class, this controller integrates with the GUI framework and manages functionalities related to visual and logical game state.
